attributes.action: human rights for all british citizens who live in the uk to have the human right to a hot meal and a drink every single day
attributes.additional_details:
SO - THIS GOV OF OURS ARE BIG ON HUMAN RIGHTS VIA THE EU ETC - SO - WHY THE HELL DON'T THEY RESPECT THE HUMAN RIGHTS OF ALL OF US IN THIS COUNTRY AND MAKE SURE THAT EVERY SINGLE PERSON (APPROX 70 MILLION) - HAVE A HOT MEAL AND SOMETHING TO DRINK EVERYDAY - RATHER THAN HAVING TO GO TO SOME GOD FORE SAKEN FOOD BANK - OUR COUNTRY WAS ONCE KNOWN AS GREAT BRITAIN - NOT SURE IT IS NOW.
PLEASE MR DAVID CAMERON - DO NOT SPEND THAT STUPID AMOUNT OF MONEY OF 50 BILLION ON YOUR NEW TRAIN SET CAUSE THERE ARE PEOPLE STARVING IN THIS COUNTRY - TRY SPENDING IT ON MAKING SURE THE HUMAN RIGHTS OF EVERYONE TO BE ABLE TO FEED THEMSELVES IS A NO.1 PRIORITY IN THIS COUNTRY AND REMAINS SO FOREVER!
